price: Жок, андай эмес! Биз алардын (күнөө) сөздөрүн жазып койобуз жана аларга азапты(н мөөнөтүн) узартабыз.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
